creator: Laura Lee Hope
description:
LibriVox recording of The Bobbsey Twins at Snow Lodge by Laura Lee Hope.
Read in English by BettyB; Katy Caselli; SAllinger; Georgann Fennell; luvmy3girls; Nancee Cline; Rachel; SuperCoconut
After an unlikely encounter with Mr. Carford, the twins learn he used to run the now-closed Snow Lodge. They learn from their father that Mr. Carford used to live at the Snow Lodge with his nephew, Dave, until a large sum of money went missing. Mr. Carford accused Dave of stealing the money, but Mr. Bobbsey knows that isn't true. Can the twins discover what really happened to the missing money and reunite the lonely Mr. Carford with his nephew? (Copyrighted summary from Goodreads - will write my own later.)
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;twins; Bobbsey Twins; winter; dime novel; stratemeyer syndicate; brothers and sisters; child detectives; lodge
